statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (12,-11) and (11,3).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{3}-{\left(-{11}\right)}}}{{{11}-{\left({12}\right)}}}=\frac{{14}}{{-{{1}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-{14} (if it's not already reduced)
